wikitext.*:
Here listed are the ''major'' '''UK editions''' of '''''[[The Silmarillion]]'''''.

==1977-1990==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Silmarillion 1977.png ‎|1977 hardcover
File:The Silmarillion 1982-del.png ‎|1977 hardcover 1982 reissued
File:The Silmarillion 1979-pb.png ‎|1979 paperback 
File:The Silmarillion 1983-pb.png ‎|1983 paperback
File:The Silmarillion 1987-pb.png ‎|1983 paperback 7th impression
</gallery>
* [[1977]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], hardcover, pp. 365. ISBN 0048231398 - (cover based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s artwork)
** Some reserved and issued as [[1982]] collector's edition in slipcase, ISBN 0048232238
* [[1979]]: [[Unwin Paperbacks]], paperback, ISBN 0048231533
* [[1983]]: Unicorn / Unwin Paperbacks, paperback, ISBN 0048232300 - (cover art by [[Roger Garland]])
** 1983 paperback edition, 7th impression ([[1987]])

==1990-2000==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Silmarillion 1992-hb.png ‎‎|1992 hardcover
File:The Silmarillion 1994-pb.png ‎|1994 paperback
File:The Silmarillion 1998-hb.png ‎|1998 hardcover 
File:The Silmarillion 1998-del.png ‎|1998 hardcover deluxe edition

* [[1992]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261102427 - (cover art by [[John Howe]])
* [[1994]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261102737
* [[1998]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0261103660 - (illustrated by [[Ted Nasmith]])
* [[1998]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0261103733 - (illustrated by Ted Nasmith)
* [[1999]]: 1992 hardcover edition, reset in 1999 - (cover art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]])
* [[1999]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261102443
* [[1999]]: 1994 paperback edition, reset in 1999 - (cover art by Ted Nasmith)
** 1999 paperback edition, 5th impression - (issued as [[2001]] hardcover collector's edition)
** 1999 paperback edition, 6th impression
** 1999 paperback edition, 33rd? impression

<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:The Silmarillion 2000-pb.png ‎|2000 paperback

* [[2000]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0261103679 - (illustrated by [[Ted Nasmith]])
* [[2002]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0007136609
* [[2004]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0007173024 - (illustrated by Ted Nasmith) 
* [[2006]]: 1999 hardcover edition, reset in 2006
* [[2007]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0007264895
* [[2008]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 0007284241 - (illustrated by Ted Nasmith)

* [[2013]]: 1999 paperback edition, 67th? impression - (cover based on J.R.R. Tolkien's artwork)
* [[2013]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 000752322X
* [[2021]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0008433941 - (illustrated by [[Ted Nasmith]])
* [[2021]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 000843395X - (illustrated by Ted Nasmith)
* [[2022]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0008537895 - (illustrated by the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|author]])
* [[2022]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0008537909 - (illustrated by the author)
* [[2023]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover with reversable dustjacket, ISBN 978-0008663124 - ([[Centenary Boxed Sets]] #1)
* [[2024]]: [[HarperCollins]] jacketless hardcover, ISBN 0008669147 - (collector's edition)
* [[2024]]: 2013 paperback edition, 22nd impression
* [[2025]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback, ISBN 978-0008775919 - (large print edition)
